messages.en: level 33(pre)
I see.

messages.zh: 好的，保持联络。嗅到气味就立刻告诉我。
messages.en: Alight, keep in contact. Tell me as soon as you smell anything.
Just press the third button. Yes.
Where’s Amiya?

messages.zh: 陈述阿米娅前往贫民窟的事情
messages.en: Inform that Amiya went to the slum
——You actually let her go on her own.

messages.zh: ......也罢，有人保护她。你跟着去了也只是拖油瓶。
messages.en: ……Nevermind, there are people protecting her. You’d only get in the way if you went.
You too, did you came back on your own?

messages.zh: 哦，企鹅物流把你送回来的是吗。
messages.en: Oh, Penguin Logistics took you back huh.

messages.zh: 你也得对自己的安全稍微上心一点。
messages.en: You need to pay more attention to your own safety as well.
Ah, Doctor?
Have you been waiting for me……
Sorry, I kept you waiting.

messages.zh: 嗯？我的表情与离开时不太一样？
messages.en: Huh? My expression is different from when I left?
Some things happened.

messages.zh: 我越来越相信，陈长官其实不是个冷漠的人。
messages.en: I’m more and more certain, that officer Ch’en is not really a cold person.

messages.zh: 即使她嘴巴很凶，但也许......我们之间的区别没有那么大。
messages.en: Although her words are cold, but perhaps……we’re not that different from each other.
She has her responsibilities.
……Ah……no wonder.
She must be bearing a lot as well.
Perhaps me too……

messages.zh: 指出阿米娅没有逃避自己做出的选择
messages.en: Point out that Amiya did not run from her choice
Is it……

messages.zh: 我......只是没有其他的选择而已。
messages.en: I……just don’t have any other choices.

messages.zh: 认为阿米娅坚持了自己的选择
messages.en: Believe that Amiya persisted with her choice.

messages.zh: ......如果导致那样的结果，也算是坚持的话。
messages.en: ……If leading results like that, can be regarded as persisting.

messages.zh: 博士没必要......这样安慰我的。
messages.en: Doctor doesn’t have to……comfort me like this.
Actually, I understand.

messages.zh: 我不知道......我们走到哪一天，这片大地才会变得不同......
messages.en: I don’t know……how long do we have to walk, before this land becomes different……
I understand.
I won’t give up.

messages.zh: 我会承担任何后果，因为......这是我自己选的。
messages.en: I will bear any consequences of this, because……this is what I chose myself.
Doctor……
Will you be……by my side?

messages.zh: 尽管......这份罪恶感会一直存在......
messages.en: Although……this feeling of guilt will always be there……
But I have to face it.
With everyone at Rhodes Island——

messages.zh: 嗯？是凯尔希医生的通讯......
messages.en: Huh? It’s transmission from Dr.Kal’tsit……

messages.zh: 凯尔希医生？请问有什么事？
messages.en: Dr.Kal’tsit? Is anything wrong?

messages.zh: 阿米娅，有几支侦查小队发来了消息。
messages.en: Amiya, some of the scout squads sent back words.

messages.zh: 不少是会让你和龙门那个陈警官感兴趣的内容。
messages.en: Many will be of interest to you and that officer Ch’en from Lungmen.
Alright, I’ll be coming right now.
